abstract: A final decision will be made by the company’s controlling family, the Bancrofts, which could seek to scuttle the sale.

abstract: The attention that’s being showered on “Dow 14,000” goes a long way toward explaining why our economy has become so susceptible to speculative bubbles.

abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission is investigating Dow Jones board member David Li over an insider trading case linked to the News Corporation‘s bid for the Wall Street Journal publisher, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Wednesday.
